blog.title: Diamond Rose
blog.description:
Just a fan of many things, mainly Roosterteeth Productions. 
Owner of the "The Shadow of the Winter Rose" AU & OCs of said Fic. 
Artist is mainly my good friend Taylor Evans 
While I remain as the Colorizer.
If you've any questions or thoughts regarding the art i post and such, please ask away. I am open to many discussions and love to share this AU and my ideas for it. 
So, ask away and have a Good Day/Night ^_^

blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol

Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

blog.name: kenkukiri
blog.title: ten times a bird!
blog.description:
Sue, 21, she/her, they/them
currently very into Critical Role and Kingdom Hearts

tags: when will ashley return from the blindspot
question: Yasha for the ask meme!
answer:
Thank you! 💕

My favourite thing about them:

Buff Lady, could rip me in half 10/10
But seriously, she is the character who surprised me the most since the beginning. At first she was kinda stand offish but it turns out that she is actually very gentle and a bit of a dork tbh.I just love her!

My least favourite thing about them:

That she is never here obviously

Favourite line:

The entire shaving conversation with Caleb is gold tbhbut also “I’m really fucking strong”

brOTP:

Of course Yasha and Molly 
But also Caleb and Yasha as well as Nott and Yasha

OTP:

No real OTP at the moment but I wouldn’t be opposed to Jasha/Jesha (do they even have a ship name?)

nOTP:

also not really a nOTP but I guess Yasha and Fjord because I just can’t see it

Random headcanon:

Back in the circus whenever there was a storm she and Molly would stay awake listening to it. No questions asked why the other was awake, just enjoying each other’s company.

Unpopular opinion:

None I think

Song I associate with them:

The Mute by Radical Face

Favourite picture of them:

None really all art of her is perfect!

summary: Oh dear gods, Episode 85 of Season 1 and the gloves came OFF!
title: Oh dear gods, Episode 85 of Season 1 and the gloves came OFF!
body:
Don’t think I’d ever been so moved by acting before. Good job, Sam!

(Also that moment about Percy’s parents was so intense and bitter and I just had to pause the video for a moment because damn!)

reblog.comment:

I’m thankful for Creativity. Without it we would have no D&D, no Marvel or DC, no Art, no magnificent way to express ourselves whatsoever.

tags: puttinng this in more tags than usual bc people should SEE IT
ANNA DID SUCH LOVELY THINGS WITH THE COLORS i'm so thrilled
summary: so, @dearhadrian and i saw the thumbnail for episode 42 and knew what we had to do... [TRAINING MONTAGE MUSIC INTENSIFIES] this...
caption:
so, @dearhadrian and i saw the thumbnail for episode 42 and knew what we had to do… [TRAINING MONTAGE MUSIC INTENSIFIES]

this collab was super fun - i did the lines, and anna did the beautiful colors! :D thanks again for joining me in drawing these dashing lads. cheers!

reblog.comment:
so, @dearhadrian and i saw the thumbnail for episode 42 and knew what we had to do… [TRAINING MONTAGE MUSIC INTENSIFIES]

this collab was super fun - i did the lines, and anna did the beautiful colors! :D thanks again for joining me in drawing these dashing lads. cheers!

summary: NEVER GONNA TELL A LIE 2: Angsty Blond Wizard Boogaloo - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
title: NEVER GONNA TELL A LIE 2: Angsty Blond Wizard Boogaloo - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: "I'm not a wizard," Ed pointed out, but the narrator ignored him.
description:
“Look, you can’t just pick super-common everyday things you know we’ve all done, like ‘eaten bread’ or 'killed a man’ or 'been horribly betrayed by a father figure’ or whatever. Pick something else,” Anders said.

Fai thought deeply for a long moment. "I’ve never gotten a parking ticket.”

reblog.comment:

Fai thought deeply for a long moment. "I’ve never gotten a parking ticket.”

trail.content_raw:

trail.content:
